get.summary: Get paginated list of CI request to the PSP regarding public bundles

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of elements for one page. Default = 50

post.summary: Create CI request to the PSP regarding public bundles

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Return OK if application is started

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

get.summary: Get paginated list of bundles of a PSP

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items for page. Default = 50

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Page number value starts from 0. Default = 1

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

post.summary: the PSP accepts a request of a CI

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

post.summary: the PSP rejects a request of a CI

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: There was an error processing the request

limit.description: Required number of items per page

itemsFound.description: Number of items found. (The last page may have fewer elements than required)

Authorization.description: JWT token get after Azure Login
